issue.title: x.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://x.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > Hasta hoy, desde hace rato, no se veían anuncios en X. Ahora se ven de nuevo y no cambié ninguna configuración. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/7y328l3e7e8sw0ocskkw4s44skgs0kokieacpbe5yo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.16.0.1857 release System version: | MacOS 15.2 (Compilación 24C101) Browser: | Safari License type: | paid Tracking protection options: | Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `AdGuard DNS filter` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)
AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Userstyles: | no sé qué es eso ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&channel=release&clid=wc9f6v&custom_filters=&dns.bootstraps=&dns.custom_filters=&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_enabled=false&dns.fallbacks=&dns.filters=1&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&dns.timeout=2000&extensions=AdGuard+Assistant+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard+Popup+Blocker+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CAdGuard+Extra+%28script%3B+url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.6.9.18.19.20.21.22&product_type=Mac&product_version=2.16.0.1857+release&referrer=&scheme_version=3&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=MacOS+15.2+%28Compilaci%C3%B3n+24C101%29&url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2Fhome&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Macintosh%3B+Intel+Mac+OS+X+10_15_7%29+AppleWebKit%2F605.1.15+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Version%2F18.2+Safari%2F605.1.15&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=mac)
